scripts.build-all: yarn run build-ui && yarn run build-css
scripts.clean: rm -rf output .spago node_modules && cd css && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build-ui: yarn run spago build -p "ui-guide/**/*.purs" -u "$RTS_ARGS" && purs bundle output/*/*.js -o dist/example.js $RTS_ARGS
scripts.watch-ui: yarn run spago bundle-app -w -u "$RTS_ARGS" --then 'yarn run build-css' -p "ui-guide/**/*.purs" --to dist/example.js
